pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.2.0, Redstone! $(li)Adds the Spell Turret.$(li)Adds Redstone Signal spell.$(li)Projectiles no longer randomly angle when fired.$(li)Dispel now returns your charm when used on Sylphs, Carbuncles, and Whelps. $(li)Bugfix with Warp Portals blocking players. $(li)Spells may be shot through portals.$(li)JEI support for the Glyph Press.

$(li)Whelps are now intelligent and no longer waste mana when using Touch.$(li)Particles now blur better.$(li)Mana Jars now display a sliver at less than 1 bucket, and now provide comparator output.$(li)Passive generation on Crystallizers has been nerfed, while active generation is now less expensive.$(li)Recipes using the Mana Bucket now use the Mana Gem.$(li)Warp Scrolls are more expensive.
